name: Air Glow Hockey Table Space Arena
name_original: Air Glow Hockey Table Space Arena
description:
Discover a new amazing air hockey game and take a journey through history. Hit the ball and choose the battle field you prefer. Challenge yourself with 3 different difficulty levels against a virtual adversary or challenge to duel a friend of yours.
This game works like a classic air hockey table game but it will bring you even more fun.
Glow Hockey delivers a new style of hockey game. Easy to play, hard to master. Challenge yourself with the computer opponents!

Features:
- Colorful graphics.
- Smooth and responsive game play.
- Realistic physics.
- 2-player mode (on the same device).
- Quick play mode (single player).
